title: Hot property: five homes for sale in the Pacific Northwest
text:
Terrebonne, Oregon, $5.75mn

Where In Ranch at the Canyons, a gated residential community at the base of Oregon's Smith Rock State Park. Redmond Municipal airport, with flights to cities in the western US, is roughly 20 minutes away by car. It's 2 hours 40 minutes to Portland international airport.

What A four-bedroom, 6,000 sq ft house built in 2013 and characterised by a mixture of stone and wood. The property comes with access to a clubhouse, horseriding centre, hiking trails and 2 miles of river frontage.

Why Every window has views of the surrounding dramatic landscape, with local landmarks including Smith Rock State Park, the Crooked River and the Cascade Mountains.

Who Cascade Hasson Sotheby's International Realty

Hunts Point, Washington, $85mn

Where On Hunts Point Road in Hunts Point, a town on the eastern shore of Lake Washington. It's a 25-minute drive to Seattle-Tacoma international airport.

What A 4.3-acre lakeside property with more than 17,000 sq ft of interior living space, split between four buildings: a five-bedroom sandstone and glass mansion designed by architect Richard Landry, a staff house, beach house and poolside cabana. The grounds feature lawns, mature trees, a tennis court, outdoor pool and hot tub.

Why The property has 327ft of Lake Washington shoreline and a dock that can accommodate boats, jet skis, a seaplane and a yacht of up to 150ft. 

Who Luxury Portfolio International, Windermere Real Estate

Gold Beach, Oregon, $7mn

Where In a clifftop location to the north of Gold Beach, a small city in Oregon's Curry County. By car, it's 3 hours 20 minutes to Rogue Valley International Medford airport, with direct flights to cities in the western US, and 5 hours 20 minutes to the larger Portland international airport.

What A lodge-style house with five bedrooms, six full bathrooms, hardwood floors and far-reaching views of the Pacific Ocean. It comes with more than 34 acres of land, on which there is a 1,460 sq ft log cabin for guests, an apartment for staff or guest use, landscaped trails, a large pond, a greenhouse and an apple orchard.

Why The house sits between two picturesque beach coves and has private access to both.

Who Coastal Sotheby's International Realty

Ketchum, Idaho, $16.9mn

Where Just north of Ketchum, a city in the Rocky Mountains. It's a 25-minute drive to Friedman Memorial airport, which offers flights to US cities including Chicago and Los Angeles. Boise international airport is about 2 hours 30 minutes by car.

What A five-bedroom, six-bathroom mountain home set in 4.6 acres, with a gym, games room, library, cinema and seven fireplaces.

Why For hikers, the 6-mile Adam's Gulch trail loop is a 15-minute walk from the property. Sun Valley ski resort is five minutes away by car.

Who Christie's International Real Estate

Donnelly, Idaho, $1.45mn

Where At Golden Bar Court in Tamarack Resort, a 15-minute drive from the city of Donnelly. It's just over 2 hours' drive to the city of Boise and its international airport.

What A three-bedroom, three-bathroom home with ski-in ski-out access. An open-plan kitchen/living area has vaulted ceilings, there's a hot tub on the patio and the property is fully furnished.

Why Tamarack Resort has 50 ski runs and 14 miles of hiking and biking trails.

Who Luxury Portfolio International, Amherst Madison Real Estate Advisors
